name: numpuzz (axgs)
description:
A classic sliding puzzle game with 4 rows and 4 columns. Sort the numbers 1 to 15 in the right order. From left to right, top to bottom. The empty place must be in the right bottom corner (screenshot)

to do:
- game timer
- soft card movement
- perhaps some particle effects
- mute button functionality for the music
- improve game assets

development tools that I used:
- Phaser 3 framework (using the Phaser 3 template with nodeJS, Webpack, BabelJS)
- Sublime Text 3 to write the code
- Aseprite for the graphics
- Renoise with Plogue PortaFM & DSK miniDrumz VST for the music
- Gimp for text editing (I used two google-fonts and modified them in aseprite)
- Foobar2000 for converting audio data (WAV) into the OGG format.
- OGG encoder
